speaker: Olivia
text: Hey, did you hear what Alex said during the meeting yesterday?
ipa: heɪ | dɪdʒə hɪɹ wʌt ˈæləks sɛd ˈdʊɹɪŋ ðə ˈmitɪŋ ˈjɛstɚˌdeɪ
stress: Hey | did you HEAR what Alex SAID during the MEETING YESTERDAY

speaker: Daniel
text: Not really. What did he say?
ipa: nɑt ˈɹɪli | wʌt dɪd i seɪ
stress: Not REALLY | what did he SAY

speaker: Olivia
text: He mentioned that the deadline had been moved to next Friday. He also explained that the client wanted a few extra features added this week.
ipa: hi ˈmɛnʃənd ðət ðə ˈdɛdlaɪn həd bɪn muvd tə nɛkst ˈfɹaɪdeɪ | hi ˈɔlsoʊ ɪkˈspleɪnd ðət ðə ˈklaɪənt ˈwɑntɪd ə fju ˈɛkstɹə ˈfiʧɚz ˈædɪd ðɪs wik
stress: He MENTIONED that the DEADLINE had been MOVED to NEXT Friday | he ALSO EXPLAINED that the CLIENT wanted a FEW EXTRA FEATURES added THIS WEEK
linking:
"had been" → /həd bɪn/ (reduction)
"moved to" → /muvd tə/ (t linking)
"added this" → /ˈædɪd ðɪs/ (d + this)

speaker: Daniel
text: Oh wow. Did he say why they changed the plan?
ipa: oʊ waʊ | dɪd i seɪ waɪ ðeɪ ʧeɪndʒd ðə plæn
stress: Oh WOW | did he SAY why they CHANGED the PLAN

speaker: Olivia
text: Yeah, he said that the client had requested it because of new business needs. He added that we would have to prioritize the API integration first.
ipa: jæ | hi sɛd ðət ðə ˈklaɪənt həd ɹɪˈkwɛstɪd ɪt bɪˈkəz əv nu ˈbɪznəs nidz | hi ˈædɪd ðət wi wəd həv tə praɪˈɔɹəˌtaɪz ði ˈeɪˌpiˌaɪ ˌɪntəˈɡɹeɪʃən fɝst
stress: Yeah | he SAID that the CLIENT had REQUESTED it because of NEW BUSINESS NEEDS | he ADDED that we would HAVE to PRIORITIZE the API INTEGRATION FIRST
linking:
"would have to" → /wəd həv tə/ (reduction)
"added that" → /ˈædɪd ðət/ (d to that)

speaker: Daniel
text: Makes sense. Did he ask us anything?
ipa: meɪks sɛns | dɪd i æsk əs ˈɛnɪˌθɪŋ
stress: Makes SENSE | did he ASK us ANYTHING

speaker: Olivia
text: He asked if we could update the documentation straight away. He also wanted to know whether we had started testing the payment module.
ipa: hi æskt ɪf wi kəd ˈʌpˌdeɪt ðə ˌdɑkjəˌmɛnˈteɪʃən streɪt əˈweɪ | hi ˈɔlsoʊ ˈwɑntɪd tə noʊ ˈwɛðɚ wi həd ˈstɑɹtɪd ˈtɛstɪŋ ðə ˈpeɪmənt ˈmɑʤul
stress: He ASKED if we could UPDATE the DOCUMENTATION STRAIGHT AWAY | he ALSO WANTED to KNOW whether we had STARTED TESTING the PAYMENT MODULE
linking:
"wanted to know" → /ˈwɑntɪd tə noʊ/ (to reduced)
"had started" → /həd ˈstɑɹtɪd/ (reduction)

speaker: Olivia
text: I told him that we had completed the initial tests the day before.
ipa: aɪ toʊld ɪm ðət wi həd kəmˈplitɪd ði ɪˈnɪʃəl tɛsts ðə deɪ bɪˈfɔɹ
stress: I TOLD him that we had COMPLETED the INITIAL TESTS the DAY BEFORE
linking:
"told him" → /toʊld ɪm/ (d links to him)
"the day before" → /ðə deɪ bɪˈfɔɹ/ (smooth)

speaker: Daniel
text: Good. Did he mention where we could find the updated requirements?
ipa: ɡʊd | dɪd i ˈmɛnʃən wɛɹ wi kəd faɪnd ði ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪd ɹɪˈkwaɪɚmənts
stress: Good | did he MENTION where we could FIND the UPDATED REQUIREMENTS
linking:
"did he" → /dɪd i/ (vowel link)
"find the" → /faɪnd ðə/ (d + the)

speaker: Olivia
text: He informed us that they had uploaded everything to the new project board. Apparently, the design team had finished their revisions earlier that morning.
ipa: hi ɪnˈfɔɹmd əs ðət ðeɪ həd ˈʌpˌloʊdɪd ˈɛvɹiˌθɪŋ tə ðə nu ˈpɹɑʤɛkt bɔɹd | əˈpɛɹəntli ðə dɪˈzaɪn tim həd ˈfɪnɪʃt ðɛɹ ɹɪˈvɪʒənz ˈɝliɚ ðət ˈmɔɹnɪŋ
stress: He INFORMED us that they had UPLOADED everything to the NEW PROJECT BOARD | apparently the DESIGN TEAM had FINISHED their REVISIONS earlier that MORNING
linking:
"uploaded everything" → /ˈʌpˌloʊdɪd ˈɛvɹiˌθɪŋ/ (d to e)
"had finished" → /həd ˈfɪnɪʃt/ (reduction)

speaker: Daniel
text: Alright. And did he say when the next review meeting would be?
ipa: ɔlˈɹaɪt | ənd dɪd i seɪ wɛn ðə nɛkst ɹɪˈvju ˈmitɪŋ wəd bi
stress: Alright | and did he SAY when the NEXT REVIEW MEETING would BE

speaker: Olivia
text: He said that it would be the following Monday. He also reminded us that we needed to submit all changes by then.
ipa: hi sɛd ðət ɪt wəd bi ðə ˈfɑloʊɪŋ ˈmʌndeɪ | hi ˈɔlsoʊ ɹɪˈmaɪndɪd əs ðət wi ˈnidɪd tə səbˈmɪt ɔl ˈʧeɪndʒɪz baɪ ðɛn
stress: He SAID that it would be the FOLLOWING MONDAY | he ALSO REMINDED us that we NEEDED to SUBMIT all CHANGES by THEN
linking:
"needed to" → /ˈnidɪd tə/ (to reduced)
"submit all" → /səbˈmɪt ɔl/ (t to all)

speaker: Daniel
text: Got it. According to Anna, they might also organize a final demo session next week.
ipa: ɡɑt ɪt | əˈkɔɹdɪŋ tə ˈænə | ðeɪ maɪt ˈɔlsoʊ ˈɔɹɡəˌnaɪz ə ˈfaɪnəl ˈdɛmoʊ ˈsɛʃən nɛkst wik
stress: Got it | according to ANNA | they MIGHT ALSO ORGANIZE a FINAL DEMO SESSION next WEEK
linking:
"might also" → /maɪt ˈɔlsoʊ/ (t to a)
"demo session" → /ˈdɛmoʊ ˈsɛʃən/ (smooth)

speaker: Olivia
text: Yeah, and supposedly the CTO wants to attend that demo too.
ipa: jæ | ənd səˈpoʊzɪdli ðə ˌsiˌtiˈoʊ wɑnts tə əˈtɛnd ðət ˈdɛmoʊ tu
stress: Yeah | and SUPPOSEDLY the CTO WANTS to ATTEND that DEMO too
linking:
"wants to" → /wɑnts tə/ (to reduced)
"attend that" → /əˈtɛnd ðət/ (d links)
